learningEnvironmentSelectorStep.onlineOr:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the learning environment selection step.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Learning Environment Selector step (main heading).
**When Users See This**: When deciding between online editor or local machine.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Online or on your computer?"
learningEnvironmentSelectorStep.solveExe:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains the options for solving exercises.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Learning Environment Selector step (paragraph).
**When Users See This**: When deciding between online editor or local machine.
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "You can solve the exercises using either our online editor, or locally within your own environment. If you use your own environment, you'll need to install both {trackTitle} and the Exercism CLI."
learningEnvironmentSelectorStep.recommen:
**Functional Purpose**: Recommends starting with the online editor.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Learning Environment Selector step (paragraph).
**When Users See This**: When deciding between online editor or local machine.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "We generally recommend starting by using our editor."
learningEnvironmentSelectorStep.howWould:
**Functional Purpose**: Asks the user to choose their preferred environment.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Learning Environment Selector step (paragraph with bold text).
**When Users See This**: When deciding between online editor or local machine.
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "How would you like to start solving the {trackTitle} exercises?"
learningEnvironmentSelectorStep.inTheOnl:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to select the online editor.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Learning Environment Selector step (button).
**When Users See This**: When selecting an environment.
**Technical Context**: Button label.
**Current English**: "In the online editor"
learningEnvironmentSelectorStep.onMyLoca:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to select a local machine environment.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Learning Environment Selector step (button).
**When Users See This**: When selecting an environment.
**Technical Context**: Button label.
**Current English**: "On my local machine"
selectedOnlineEditorStep.youreAllSet:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating successful selection.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Selected Online Editor step (main heading).
**When Users See This**: After choosing the online editor.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "You're all set!"
selectedOnlineEditorStep.changeMindInstr:
**Functional Purpose**: Provides instructions for changing the environment later.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Selected Online Editor step (paragraph).
**When Users See This**: After choosing the online editor.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "If you change your mind later and want to work in your own environment, you'll find instructions for installing the Exercism CLI and language tooling on the right-hand side of each exercise."
selectedOnlineEditorStep.letsJumpIntoFir:
**Functional Purpose**: Encourages the user to start the first exercise.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Selected Online Editor step (paragraph).
**When Users See This**: After choosing the online editor.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Let's jump straight into the first exercise, "Hello, World!", which will ensure you're comfortable with the editor."
selectedOnlineEditorStep.continueToOnlin:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to proceed to the online editor.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Selected Online Editor step (button).
**When Users See This**: After choosing the online editor.
**Technical Context**: Button label.
**Current English**: "Continue to online editor"
selectedOnlineEditorStep.resetChoices:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to reset the selected learning environment choices.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Selected Online Editor step (button).
**When Users See This**: After choosing the online editor, if the user wishes to change their selection.
**Technical Context**: Button label.
**Current English**: "Reset choices"
welcomeToTrack.welcomeTo:
**Functional Purpose**: Welcome heading for the track.
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal â†’ Initial Welcome screen (main heading).
**When Users See This**: When the user first opens the welcome modal for a specific track.
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
